dragons fury neutral properties.value:
Uses a shared pressure tank for Primary Fire and Alt-Fire.

Primary Fire: Launches a fast-moving projectile that briefly ignites enemies Alt-Fire: Release a blast of air that pushes enemies and projectiles, and extinguishes teammates that are on fire.

Killing blows on burning players grant a speed boost.
